Sarglagons dwell in [Hell's](/Planes.aspx?ID=42)myriad waterways, lakes, and oceans. They serve as guardians of the Academy of Lies—the repository of secrets in Stygia, the fifth layer of Hell. Sarglagons breathe water and air with equal ease, and can move through water, land, and even air with uncanny swiftness. Few fiends travel the waterways of the multiverse, but where a river crosses the planes, odds are sarglagons have traveled it to further their infernal machinations. The only body of water they avoid is the River Styx, as the fiends have yet to develop any defense against that waterway's memory-sapping qualities. Mortal spellcasters sometimes bind sarglagons as guardians of precious secrets or treasures, particularly in aquatic areas. Most strangely, sarglagons sometimes act as unnerving caretakers to mortals who have no idea what they did to earn their unwanted protectors' attention. The constant uninvited vigilance of these devils is often disturbing and stifling to their wards. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 24 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19 [Sarglagon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2908) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 89 1.1 **Perception** +18; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), see the unseen **Languages** [Diabolic](/Languages.aspx?ID=117), [Empyrean](/Languages.aspx?ID=115); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=79) 100 feet **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +15, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15 **Str** +6 **Dex** +3 **Con** +4 **Int** +2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +3 --- **AC** 27 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +13 **Will** +16 +1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) **HP** 120 **Immunities** [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) **Resistances** physical 5 (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379)), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) 10 **Weaknesses** [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517) 5 **Heavy Aura** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=631)) 10 feet. A creature that enters the heavy aura must attempt a DC 23 Will save. It is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes.
**Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Failure** The creature is [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=70) while it remains in the area. If the creature is already encumbered, it is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81) while it remains within the aura.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the effect persists for 3 rounds after leaving the aura.
**Stygian Guardian** **Trigger** A creature or object within the sarglagon's reach is targeted by an attack; **Effect** The sarglagon interposes themself, giving the creature or object [standard cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459) against the attack (+2 circumstance bonus to AC), or greater cover (+4 circumstance bonus to AC) if the sarglagon was already granting it lesser cover. --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 25 feet, swim 30 feet **Melee** fangs +20 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d12+9 piercing **Melee** tentacle arm +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d8+9 bludgeoning plus sarglagon venom **Divine Innate Spells** DC 23, attack +18 - **4th** [Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724) (at will), [Hydraulic Torrent](/Spells.aspx?ID=155), [Unfettered Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732) - **5th** [Control Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=51), [Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724) - **Constant (2nd)** [See the Unseen](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663) **Rituals** DC 23 - **1st** [Diabolic Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=143) **Drown** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) The sarglagon conjures murky water to fill the lungs of a creature within 30 feet of it that can't breathe water. The target must attempt a DC 26 Fortitude save.
**Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target coughs up water and is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91).
**Failure** The target is [holding its breath](/Rules.aspx?ID=468). The only action it can take is to attempt a Fortitude save against Drown to expel the water, which is a single action.
**Critical Failure** The target falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95) and begins suffocating. If the target succeeds at its Fortitude save while suffocating, it coughs up the water and can breathe again. **Sarglagon Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 26 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d6 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 round)
